name: ESP_ConfigStore
keywords: littlefs, spiffs, json, arduinojson, data, esp32, esp32-c3, esp32-s2, esp32-s3, esp8266, configuration, config-store
description: Library to store configuration parameters in the file system using LittleFS or SPIFFS for ESP8266 and ESP32. Using the ArduinoJson library the parameters are stored in memory as a JSON document and saved as a JSON file.
